name: Holiday Games and Puzzles - Rock out to Christmas with songs and music
name_original: Holiday Games and Puzzles - Rock out to Christmas with songs and music
description:
Help the Rocker Santas match gifts and goodies on this epic Christmas adventure!

Key Features:
▶ MUCH easier than other matching games.
▶ Over 300 levels - with more added each week!
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center.
▶ Unlock powerful items.
▶ Super cute characters.

Download for FREE! *Limited time only.*
